Name: BingeNairs
Title: Oldest book shop in leh
Review: Having a calm and non pestering shop keeper is a rare sight in tourist places and yet the owner of this small yet relevant bookstore gives us a glimpse of how your product speaks for itself

Name: Peregrineri
Title: Nice little bookstore with used books
Review: It's not a big bookstore, but they have a good selection of used books and also maps and books on Ladakh. The Sikh owner is really friendly and helpful.
